meanings.definition: Resembling a frog in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The boy's froglike leap across the yard impressed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The pond was filled with froglike creatures hopping around.
meanings.sent3: The froglike mascot at the game made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her froglike agility on the dance floor was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The froglike features of the statue made it seem almost alive.
